Divider dropdown

When the.show class starts, dropdown appears. And .dropdown-divider to change dropdown section.

@for (allData of dividerDropdownDtaa; track allData) {
    @for (items of allData.dropdownItem; track items) {
  • {{items.item}}
    • }
    • @for (items of allData.dividerItem; track items) {
